PARM_DESC_TXT: This is for setting the number of item information we can get from a single solr call.The number should be based on the maxhttpheadersize parameter in the tomcats server.xml file.We need to provide the value in a way so that the generated query size should not exceed the size of the maxhttpheadersize.This will be the maximum value for (maxhttpheadersize - 1000)/50
